byline.original: By FARES AKRAM and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Fares Akram reported from Gaza, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.

abstract: Militant group Islamic Jihad reports that Israeli airstrikes killed seven of its Palestinian members in southern Gaza, and militants fired salvos of rockets at cities in southern Israel, killing one Israeli man and wounding at least two others in a sudden escalation of cross-border violence.
snippet: At least five Palestinians at an Islamic Jihad training site in southern Gaza were killed, according to witnesses and the militant group, and militants responded with rocket fire.
lead_paragraph: At least five Palestinians at an Islamic Jihad training site in southern Gaza were killed, according to witnesses and the militant group, and militants responded with rocket fire.

headline.main: Israeli Drone Strike Kills Militants in Southern Gaza
headline.print_headline: Israeli Drone Strike Kills Militants in Gaza
headline.seo: Israeli Drone Strike Kills Militants in Gaza
